title: New & MPfree: Gonjasufi – Nikels & Dimes
body:
We here at CITR are huge fans of LA based psych-hop artist **[Gonjasufi](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/216-gonjasufi-a-sufi-and-a-killer/ "Review: Gonjasufi – A Sufi And A Killer")**, so much so that one of our first [articles,](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/216-gonjasufi-a-sufi-and-a-killer/ "Review: Gonjasufi – A Sufi And A Killer") (way back in April 2010), was a detailed review of his debut LP, _A Sufi and a Killer_**.** The work that followed was equally as impressive, the last example was the free EP he dropped **[only last month](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12135-new-gonjasufi-the-9th-inning-ep/ "New: Gonjasufi – The 9th Inning EP")**. It seems that **Gonja** is on a roll, with his next body of work due to be released in **Warp** on January 23.

The first cut from the mini album is a haunting, soothing yet remarkably brittle assault on the senses. When describing his work, it’s admittedly easy to contradict, at least on the surface. Yet perhaps this reveals a beauty within the work?

Steam the new track below and input your email to download.
